Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

19  KESSRelaxation::KESSRelaxation() :
20  fSiliconBandGap(0.)
21  {
22  }
23 
24  void KESSRelaxation::RelaxAtom( unsigned int vacantShell,
25  const KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
26  KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
27  {
28 
29  intmsg_debug( "KESSRelaxation::RelaxAtom" << eom );
30 
31  //find ionized shell depending on energy
32  //1 - K Shell 1839eV
33  //21 - L1 148.7eV
34  //22 - L2 99.2eV
35  //23 - L3 99.2eV
36  //3 - M(11.4eV)
37  //4 - M(uniform 0-11.4eV)
38 
39  if (vacantShell == 1)
40  {
41  intmsg_debug( "Relax - K Shell" << eom );
42 
43  RelaxKShell( aFinalParticle,
44  aQueue );
45  }
46  else if (vacantShell == 21)
47  {
48  intmsg_debug( "Relax - L1 Shell" << eom );
49 
50  RelaxL1Shell( aFinalParticle,
51  aQueue );
52  }
53  else if (vacantShell == 22 || vacantShell == 23)
54  {
55  intmsg_debug( "Relax - L23 Shell" << eom );
56 
57  RelaxL23Shell( aFinalParticle,
58  aQueue );
59  }
60  else
61  {
62  intmsg(eError) << "KESSRelaxation::RelaxAtom" << ret << "Unknown Shell: " << vacantShell << eom;
63  }
64  }
65 
66  void KESSRelaxation::RelaxL23Shell( const KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
67  KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
68  {
69 
70  CreateMMVacancies( 23,
71  aFinalParticle,
72  aQueue );
73 
74  }
75 
76  void KESSRelaxation::RelaxL1Shell( const KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
77  KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
78  {
79 
80  intmsg_debug( "KESSRelaxation::RelaxL1Shell" << eom );
81 
82  double eL1 = this->GetBindingEnergy(21);
83  double eL2 = this->GetBindingEnergy(22);
84 
85  double augerEnergy = 0.;
86  double random = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
87 
88 
89  //Fluorescence is 9.77x10e-6;
90  if (random < 0.975)
91  { // 49.5eV
92  // L23 vacancy
93 
94  double holeEnergy = this->GetBindingEnergy(3) * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
95  augerEnergy = eL1 - eL2 - holeEnergy - fSiliconBandGap;
96 
97  CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
98  aFinalParticle,
99  aQueue );
100  this->RelaxL23Shell( aFinalParticle,
101  aQueue );
102 
103  }
104  else if (random >= 0.975 && random < 1)
105  {
106  // 132eV
107  // M,M vacancy
108  CreateMMVacancies( 21,
109  aFinalParticle,
110  aQueue );
111 
112  }
113  else
114  {
115  intmsg(eError) << "KESSRelaxation::RelaxL1Shell" << ret << "L1 Shell undefined probability!" << eom;
116  }
117  return;
118  }
119 
120  void KESSRelaxation::RelaxKShell( const KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
121  KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
122  {
123 
124  intmsg(eDebug) << "KESSRelaxation::RelaxKShell" << eom;
125 
126  double augerEnergy = 0.;
127 
128  double eK = this->GetBindingEnergy(1);
129  double eL1 = this->GetBindingEnergy(21);
130  double eL2 = this->GetBindingEnergy(22);
131 
132  double random = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
133 
134  /*
135  * transition prob vacancy
136  * KL1L1 19.2 L1 L1
137  * KL1L2 38.8 L1 L2
138  * KL2L2 23.3 L2 L2
139  * KL1M 7.5 L1 M
140  * KL2M 10.4 L2 M
141  * KMM 0.8 M M
142  */
143 
144  random -= 0.192;
145  if (random <= 0)
146  {
147  //KL1L1
148  intmsg_debug( "KL1L1" << eom );
149  augerEnergy = eK - eL1 - eL1 - fSiliconBandGap;
150  CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
151  aFinalParticle,
152  aQueue );
153  RelaxL1Shell( aFinalParticle,
154  aQueue );
155  RelaxL1Shell( aFinalParticle,
156  aQueue );
157  return;
158  }
159  random -= 0.388;
160  if (random <= 0)
161  {
162  //KL1L2
163  intmsg_debug( "KL1L2" << eom );
164  augerEnergy = eK - eL1 - eL2 - fSiliconBandGap;
165  CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
166  aFinalParticle,
167  aQueue );
168  RelaxL1Shell( aFinalParticle,
169  aQueue );
170  RelaxL23Shell( aFinalParticle,
171  aQueue );
172  return;
173  }
174  random -= 0.233;
175  if (random <= 0)
176  {
177  //KL2L2
178  intmsg_debug( "KL2L2" << eom );
179  augerEnergy = eK - eL2 - eL2 - fSiliconBandGap;
180  CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
181  aFinalParticle,
182  aQueue );
183  RelaxL23Shell( aFinalParticle,
184  aQueue );
185  RelaxL23Shell( aFinalParticle,
186  aQueue);
187  return;
188  }
189  random -= 0.075;
190  if (random <= 0)
191  {
192  //KL1M
193  intmsg_debug( "KL1M" << eom );
194 
195  double holeEnergy = this->GetBindingEnergy(3) * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
196  //To allow for a further DAQ simulation: this->AddChargeCarriers(0.,holeEnergy);
197  augerEnergy = eK - eL1 - holeEnergy - fSiliconBandGap;
198 
199  CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
200  aFinalParticle,
201  aQueue );
202 
203  RelaxL1Shell( aFinalParticle,
204  aQueue );
205  return;
206  }
207 
208  random -= 0.104;
209  if (random <= 0)
210  {
211  //KL2M
212  intmsg_debug( "KL23M" << eom );
213 
214  double holeEnergy = this->GetBindingEnergy(3) * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
215  //To allow for a further DAQ simulation: this->AddChargeCarriers(0.,holeEnergy);
216  augerEnergy = eK - eL2 - holeEnergy - fSiliconBandGap;
217 
218  CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
219  aFinalParticle,
220  aQueue );
221 
222  this->RelaxL23Shell( aFinalParticle,
223  aQueue );
224  return;
225  }
226  random -= 0.008;
227  if (random <= 0)
228  {
229  //KMM
230  CreateMMVacancies( 1,
231  aFinalParticle,
232  aQueue );
233  return;
234  }
235  else
236  {
237  intmsg(eError) << "KESSRelaxation::RelaxKShell" << ret << "Probability Problem!" << eom;
238  return;
239  }
240  }
241 
242  void KESSRelaxation::CreateMMVacancies(unsigned int fromThisShell,
243  const KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
244  KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
245  {
246 
247  intmsg_debug( "KESSRelaxation::CreateMMVacancies" << ret << "MMVacany from: " << fromThisShell << eom );
248 
249  double random11;
250  double probability;
251  double augerEnergy = 0.;
252 
253  do
254  {
255  random11 = -1 + 2 * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
256  probability = 1 - std::fabs(random11);
257 
258  }
259  while (KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() > probability);
260 
261  augerEnergy = this->GetBindingEnergy(fromThisShell) - (1 + random11) * this->GetBindingEnergy(3) - fSiliconBandGap;
262 
263  // uncomment if you want to track holes for a further DAQ Simulation
264  /* Double_t hole1=(1 + random11) * this->GetBindingEnergy(3)*KRandom::GetInstance()->Uniform();
265  Double_t hole2=(1 + random11) * this->GetBindingEnergy(3)-hole1;
266  this->AddChargeCarriers(0.,hole1);
267  this->AddChargeCarriers(0.,hole2);*/
268 
269 
270  this->CreateAugerElectron( augerEnergy,
271  aFinalParticle,
272  aQueue );
273  }
274 
275  double KESSRelaxation::GetBindingEnergy(unsigned int ionizedShell)
276  {
277  intmsg_debug( "KESSRelaxation::GetBindingEnergy" << eom );
278 
279  //find ionized shell depending on energy
280  //1 - K Shell 1839eV
281  //21 - L1 148.7eV
282  //22 - L2 99.2eV
283  //23 - L3 99.2eV
284  //3 - M(11.4eV)
285  //4 - M(0-11.4)
286 
287  switch (ionizedShell)
288  {
289  case 1:
290  return 1839.;
291  break;
292 
293  case 21:
294  return 148.7;
295  break;
296 
297  case 22:
298  return 99.2;
299  break;
300 
301  case 23:
302  return 99.2;
303  break;
304 
305  case 3:
306 
307  return 11.4;
308  break;
309 
310  case 4:
311  return 11.4 * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
312  break;
313 
314  default:
315  intmsg(eError) << "KESSRelaxation::GetBindingEnergy" << ret << "Unknown Ionized Shell!" << eom;
316  return 0;
317  }
318 
319  }
320 
321  void KESSRelaxation::CreateAugerElectron(const double& augerEnergy_eV,
322  const KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
323  KSParticleQueue& aQueue)
324  {
325  KSParticle* AugerElectron = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create(11);
326 
327  (*AugerElectron) = aFinalParticle;
328  AugerElectron->SetKineticEnergy_eV(augerEnergy_eV);
329  AugerElectron->SetPolarAngleToZ( 180*std::acos(1-2*KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform())/KConst::Pi() );
330  AugerElectron->SetAzimuthalAngleToX( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() * 360 );
331  AugerElectron->SetLabel( "KESSRelaxation" );
332 
333  aQueue.push_back(AugerElectron);
334  }
335
